title: Wiz Uncovers Critical Access Bypass Flaw in AI-Powered Vibe Coding Platform Base44
description: Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed a now-patched critical security flaw in a popular vibe coding platform called Base44 that could allow unauthorized access to private applications built by its users. "The vulnerability we discovered was remarkably simple to exploit -- by providing only a non-secret app_id value to undocumented registration and email verification endpoints, an attacker
